body.p: Just wanted to let people know that the IBM developerWorks Linux Zone is featuring quite a few new articles and tutorials written by Gentoo Linux developers.

The most ambitious project we're working on is the series of eight LPI certification tutorials. The purpose of this tutorial series is to provide you with the knowledge you need to attain LPIC Level 1 Linux Certification. The first four tutorials [ part 1 | part 2 | part 3 | part 4 ] are already online, and the others will be appearing shortly. Special thanks to Aron Griffis and Chris Houser for serving as my co-authors and helping me to tackle this incredibly challenging project.
In addition to the LPI tutorials, my Linux clustering with MOSIX tutorial is up, and Mikael Hallendal and Richard Hult's new GNOMEnclature article is on the site as well. Enjoy!
